desc: This course focuses on evidence-based reading and differentiation strategies that can be used across the curriculum by secondary teachers. Needs of the struggling reader and readers with special needs are addressed along with assessment, evaluation, communication, and intervention design. Required 10-hour field experience. Prerequisite: Education 290 or permission of instructor.
name: Reading/Diff Instruction
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Education 290 or permission of instructor.
title: The Exceptional Child
